Plot: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.
Title: The Cell
Actors: Jennifer Lopez, Colton James, Dylan Baker, Marianne Jean-Baptiste
tomatoConsensus: The Cell offers disturbing, stunning eye candy, but it is undermined by a weak and shallow plotline that offers nothing new.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 23 nominations.
